summary: Trapped inside an abandoned building, a group of friends must fight for their lives from a disturbed ax-wielding maniac.
cast: Norbert Velez|Aniela McGuinness|Todd Bruno|GiGi Calero|Giordan Diaz|Tom Stedham|Daniela Larez|Reggie Peters|Mario Nalini|Dennis Spain|Brandi Rudicil|Massiel Checo
title: HazMat
